name: Eggs Incorporated
description:
Nesting Solutions Incorporated, otherwise known as Eggs Inc, has hired you to work on their bespoke egg transportation technology! Build machines from the finest Danish plastic and make a nest in 6 challenging levels!

CONTROLS:

  • Left click (+drag) - build
  • Right click - delete
  • Scroll (or Q/E for those lacking a good scroll wheel) - rotate

Made for SoftJamGameWire, and heavily inspired by an ancient Lego flash game.

All assets CC0
